title: Andrew Luck throwing footballs again, Big-name minicamp holdouts (Football 06/13)
description:
Nick Kostos is joined by CBS NFL Insider Jason La Canfora to analyze Andrew Luck's return to throwing footballs and to breakdown a series of big-name minicamp holdouts and if and when their deals will get done. Nick and JLC discuss Aaron Donald in LA, Khalil Mack in Oakland, Julio Jones in Atlanta and David Johnson in Arizona, who are all absent from their respective team minicamps this week. Finally, the guys discuss Jason's list of quarterbacks under pressure in the 2018 season with names that include Ryan Tannehill and Patrick Mahomes.
